name: fake-dynamo-gem
description: A node wrapper for the fake_dynamo gem

scripts.update: GEM_HOME=./ruby gem update fake_dynamo && npm run-script clean
scripts.clean: cd ./ruby && rm -rf build_info cache doc && cd gems && rm -rf */test */tests */spec */example*

author: Michael Hart <michael.hart.au@gmail.com> (http://github.com/mhart)
